short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight DOM attributes, and copy their attribute path

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powertool created for the use of Web based QA automation tests in mind.

Features:
* Allows highlighting all DOM elements on the screen containing a specific DOM attribute (specified in extention options)
* Allows the user to easily comprehand attribute values stored on DOMs at a glance.
* Vieweing heirarchy of doms under the same attribute selector
* Copying attribute data directly to clipboard (with the use of hotkeys)
* Copying selector used to match these DOMs to clipboard (with the use of hotkeys)
* Copying (attribute data / selector) path to hovered component
* UI is slick and animated!
